rules_text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Always searching for answers, the shamans have delved into the minds of animals. One has deviated from the path, immersing himself in nature's harmony.[/i]
